Danish Royalty, Denmark Frederick IX & Wife Ingrid at Proclamation, 1947 Product Photo Click Image for Larger Preview Product Information This is a nice vintage early printed postcard showing Denmark Frederick IX & Wife Ingrid at the Proclamation in 1947. Publisher: Unknown. The corners have light wear. The image is nice but with a light postal cancellation on Ingrid. Postally used in 1947. Please Note: If you see a florescent colored line or streak on the postcard image it is from the scan, not on the card. Typically found a vertical line to the right of the center.The colors tend to come in Green, Yellow, Pink, Blue, Purple & Red. Shipping and Payment TERMS OF SALE: We Do Combine Shipping on Orders. Please wait for a combined Hip invoice with one shipping charge so that you can make one payment. Payment is due within three business days after closing of the auction or sale. Postage & Handling: We Do Combine Shipping on Orders. Please wait for a combined Hip invoice with one shipping charge so that you can make one payment. Orders of single postcards under $14.99 is $2.50 for postage and handling. Orders of single postcards $14.99-74.99 is $5.00 for postage, tracking and handling. All Orders $75.00 and greater may have additional postage, tracking and handling. International shipping is $4.50 for orders under $65. For orders $65 or higher there can be additional charges per listing so that the item can be mailed with tracking or USPS Registered Mail. Combining lots or group lots may be additional depending upon the weight of the package and number of payments. Large Group Lots and other items having specific shipping charges as per the listing. RETURN POLICY All items come with an unconditional 30-day return privilege. Each returned item must be in its original undamaged condition, shipped in the original hard sleeve and should be accompanied by a copy of our invoice. Any returned item should be shipped fully insured for your protection. We use AuctionHelper ! Guaranteed to sell more of your items!
